input_data.title: Terra Nova
input_data.overview: In the year 2149, the world is dying. The planet is overdeveloped and overcrowded, with the majority of plant and animal life extinct. The future of mankind is in jeopardy, and its only hope for survival is in the distant past. An ordinary family goes on an extraordinary journey back in time to prehistoric Earth as a part of a massive expedition to save the human race.

response.analytical_summary: Terra Nova is a science fiction adventure series centered on a family who travels back in time to the prehistoric era as part of a colonization effort. The show explores themes of environmental responsibility, familial bonds, and the potential consequences of altering the past. It blends action-adventure elements with a mystery surrounding the true nature of the time travel program and the dangers lurking in the prehistoric world. The series aims to deliver a thrilling exploration of survival and the fragility of both humanity and the planet.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with the Reynolds family – Jim, Elizabeth, and their three children – selected to be among the first colonists to travel back 100 million years to the Cretaceous period. The Chrono-Tech corporation, responsible for the time travel technology, hopes to establish a new colony and potentially reverse the environmental damage of the future. Upon arrival, the family discovers that the prehistoric world is far more dangerous and complex than anticipated, facing threats from dinosaurs and encountering other, more sinister forces already present in the past. As the colony grows, secrets about Chrono-Tech's true motives begin to surface, revealing a darker agenda beyond simple colonization. The Reynolds family finds themselves caught in a web of corporate intrigue and must navigate the perils of the past while uncovering a conspiracy that threatens to unravel the entire timeline. The series follows their struggle for survival and their fight to expose the truth, ultimately questioning the ethics of altering history and the potential consequences of playing God.
response.keyword_sentence: Terra Nova is a suspenseful science fiction adventure series that explores themes of survival and moral responsibility as a family journeys back to prehistoric Earth to escape a dying future, uncovering a corporate conspiracy amidst dangerous dinosaur encounters.
